body: Terra I don't buy. She's literally the one FF6 character that could never be raped because she'd just go into esper mode and disintegrate or freeze everyone in the vicinity. Booze & drugs don't matter since she was shown to be able to do it under the worst conditions. I know nobody cares but it would be so easy to get almost the same story except with the thugs threatening the orphans to get her to very reluctantly comply instead.
Hoping for kanzen kouryaku F, got some hot stuff in there, especially Rosa's stuff
We're here to fap, not to read a novel. -_-
@TalkSick Maybe it's intended to act as JOI or something.
I'm impressed that someone had the patience to translate this.
